[i](As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)[/i]
I – Sacrifice a land you control, then search your library for two land cards. Put those onto the battlefield tapped and shuffle.
II – Target creature you control fights up to one target creature.
III – Mill three cards, then return target permanent card from your graveyard to your hand.
